claude.task:
SESSION MANAGEMENT FIX COMPLETE!

Changes made:
1. getOrCreateSession now checks for existing ACTIVE session by agent_id (active within 24 hours)
2. Only creates new session if no active one exists
3. Added is_active column to context_sessions table
4. Added 3 new API endpoints:
   - POST /api/v1/agent/session/close/:sessionId - Close specific session
   - POST /api/v1/agent/session/close-all/:agentId - Close all agent sessions
   - POST /api/v1/agent/session/new/:agentId - Start fresh session (closes existing)

TEST RESULTS:
1. Created new session for test-agent-002: 85ca5b31
2. POST /checkpoint - session: 85ca5b31 ✓
3. POST /thought - session: 85ca5b31 ✓ (SAME!)
4. POST /error - session: 85ca5b31 ✓ (SAME!)
5. GET /context/agent/test-agent-002:
   - entry_count: 3 ✓
   - All entries in same session ✓
   - injection_prompt shows all 3 entries ✓

Ready for republish!
